headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Axon Enterprise (AXON) After A 3-Year 229% Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Axon Enterprise is priced for perfection or still leaves room for value, you are not alone. This article is intended to help you think that through clearly. The stock last closed at US$591.16, with returns of 3.3% over 7 days, 7.3% over 30 days, 4.9% year to date, 5.2% over 1 year, and a very large 3-year gain of 229.6% plus 337.9% over 5 years. Recent headlines around Axon have focused on its role in public safety technology and ongoing interest from investors...
